gobblin.metrics

Class MetricContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codahale.metrics.MetricRegistry
      • gobblin.metrics.MetricContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.codahale.metrics.Metric, com.codahale.metrics.MetricSet, ReportableContext, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RootMetricContext

    public class MetricContext
extends com.codahale.metrics.MetricRegistry
implements ReportableContext, java.io.Closeable
    This class models a MetricSet that optionally has a list of Tags and a set of ScheduledReporters associated with it. The Tags associated with a MetricContext are used to construct the common metric name prefix of registered Metrics.

    MetricContexts can form a hierarchy and any MetricContext can create children MetricContexts. A child MetricContext inherit all the Tags associated with its parent, in additional to the Tags of itself. Tags inherited from its parent will appear in front of those of itself when constructing the metric name prefix.

      • register

        public <T extends com.codahale.metrics.Metric> T register(java.lang.String name,
                                                          T metric)
                                                   throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Register a given metric under a given name.

        This method does not support registering MetricSets. SeeMetricRegistry.registerAll(com.codahale.metrics.MetricSet).

        This method will not register a metric with the same name in the parent context (if it exists).

        Overrides:
        register in class com.codahale.metrics.MetricRegistry
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • remove

        public boolean remove(java.lang.String name)
        Remove a metric with a given name.

        This method will remove the metric with the given name from this MetricContext as well as metrics with the same name from every child MetricContexts.

        Overrides:
        remove in class com.codahale.metrics.MetricRegistry
        Parameters:
        name - name of the metric to be removed
        Returns:
        whether or not the metric has been removed

        Description copied from interface: ReportableContext
